document_data.name: Myndlar
document_data.History:
Myndlar hailed from [[Athkatla]] but settled in Candlekeep.

In [[1487 DR]], [[Elminster Aumar]], disguised as [[Andannas Dalkur]], spoke to him about [[Orold Archemusk]]'s writings.
document_data.Personality: Myndlar believed that [[dragon]]s sought to steer human thought by writing books, purporting to be human women, and by sending dreams to humans who'd established reputations as writers.
